report.title: Species Richness Per fine Habitat
report.description: Return the average number of species found at each fine habitat, this excludes broad habitats. For instance a grass habitat might have an average of 5 different species. This is made slightly more complicated because the habitat is held at sample level instead of location level.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM terms hab JOIN termlists_terms ttHab ON ttHab.term_id=hab.id AND ttHab.parent_id IS NOT NULL AND (ttHab.id=#fine_habitat# OR #fine_habitat#=0) AND ttHab.deleted=false JOIN sample_attribute_values sampHabVal on sampHabVal.int_value=ttHab.id AND sampHabVal.sample_attribute_id=#habitat_attr_id# AND sampHabVal.deleted=false JOIN samples samp on samp.id = sampHabVal.sample_id AND (samp.created_on >= CAST(COALESCE('#ignore_dates_before#','1500-01-01') as date) OR '#ignore_dates_before#'='') AND samp.deleted=false JOIN locations plot on plot.id = samp.location_id AND plot.deleted=false JOIN surveys su on su.id=samp.survey_id AND (su.id=#survey_id# OR #survey_id#=0) AND su.deleted=false LEFT JOIN occurrences o on o.sample_id = samp.id AND o.deleted = false LEFT JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl on ttl.id = o.taxa_taxon_list_id AND ttl.deleted=false WHERE hab.deleted=false #filters# AND #website_filter# GROUP BY hab.term,ttHab.id

param.name: habitat_attr_id
param.description: Id of the sample attribute that holds the habitat.

param.name: ignore_dates_before
param.description: Ignore data created before this date.

column.name: habitat_abbr
column.sql: CASE WHEN hab.term='Acid fens, mires and springs' then 'AFF' WHEN hab.term='Arable field margins' then 'AFM' WHEN hab.term='Base-rich fens, mires and springs' then 'BFF' WHEN hab.term='Blanket bog' then 'BB' WHEN hab.term='Coastal saltmarsh' then 'CS' WHEN hab.term='Coastal sand dunes' then 'CSD' WHEN hab.term='Coastal vegetated shingle' then 'CVS' WHEN hab.term='Dry acid grassland' then 'DAG' WHEN hab.term='Dry calcareous grassland' then 'DCG' WHEN hab.term='Dry deciduous woodland' then 'DDW' WHEN hab.term='Dry heathland' then 'DH' WHEN hab.term='Montane dry heathland' then 'DMH' WHEN hab.term='Hedgerows of native species' then 'HNS' WHEN hab.term='Inland rocks and scree' then 'IRS' WHEN hab.term='Machair' then 'M' WHEN hab.term='Maritime cliffs and slopes' then 'MCT' WHEN hab.term='Montane acid grassland' then 'MAG' WHEN hab.term='Montane calcareous grassland' then 'MCG' WHEN hab.term='Montane rocks and scree' then 'MRS' WHEN hab.term='Native conifer woods and juniper scrub' then 'NPW' WHEN hab.term='Neutral damp grassland' then 'NDG' WHEN hab.term='Neutral pastures and meadows' then 'NPM' WHEN hab.term='Nutrient-poor lakes and ponds' then 'NPL' WHEN hab.term='Nutrient-rich lakes and ponds' then 'NRL' WHEN hab.term='Raised bog' then 'RB' WHEN hab.term='Rivers and streams' then 'RS' WHEN hab.term='Wet heath' then 'WH' WHEN hab.term='Wet woodland' then 'WW' ELSE hab.term END

column.name: mean_species_richness
column.sql:
(select round(avg(count_richness_per_plot),2) FROM (select plot2.id as plot_id, plot_counts.count as count_richness_per_plot FROM locations plot2 JOIN samples samp2 on samp2.location_id=plot2.id AND samp2.deleted=false AND (samp2.created_on >= CAST(COALESCE('#ignore_dates_before#','1500-01-01') as date) OR '#ignore_dates_before#'='') JOIN sample_attribute_values sampHabVal2 on sampHabVal2.sample_id=samp2.id AND sampHabVal2.sample_attribute_id=#habitat_attr_id# AND sampHabVal2.deleted=false JOIN termlists_terms ttHab2 ON ttHab2.id=sampHabVal2.int_value AND ttHab2.parent_id IS NOT NULL AND (ttHab2.id=ttHab.id) AND ttHab2.deleted=false JOIN surveys su2 on su2.id=samp2.survey_id AND su2.deleted=false AND (su2.id=#survey_id# OR #survey_id#=0)
LEFT JOIN
(select plot3.id as plot_id, count(distinct ttl3.taxon_meaning_id) as count FROM locations plot3 JOIN samples samp3 on samp3.location_id = plot3.id AND samp3.deleted=false AND (samp3.created_on >= CAST(COALESCE('#ignore_dates_before#','1500-01-01') as date) OR '#ignore_dates_before#'='') JOIN sample_attribute_values sampHabVal3 on sampHabVal3.sample_id=samp3.id AND sampHabVal3.sample_attribute_id=#habitat_attr_id# AND sampHabVal3.deleted=false JOIN termlists_terms ttHab3 ON ttHab3.id=sampHabVal3.int_value AND ttHab3.parent_id IS NOT NULL AND (ttHab3.id=ttHab.id) AND ttHab3.deleted=false JOIN surveys su3 on su3.id=samp3.survey_id AND su3.deleted=false AND (su3.id=#survey_id# OR #survey_id#=0) JOIN occurrences o3 on o3.sample_id=samp3.id AND o3.deleted=false JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl3 on ttl3.id=o3.taxa_taxon_list_id AND ttl3.deleted=false WHERE plot3.deleted=false GROUP BY plot3.id) plot_counts ON plot_counts.plot_id=plot2.id WHERE plot2.deleted=false GROUP BY plot2.id,plot_counts.count) as counts)

column.name: standard_deviation
column.sql:
(select round(stddev(count_richness_per_plot),2) FROM (select plot2.id as plot_id, plot_counts.count as count_richness_per_plot FROM locations plot2 JOIN samples samp2 on samp2.location_id=plot2.id AND samp2.deleted=false AND (samp2.created_on >= CAST(COALESCE('#ignore_dates_before#','1500-01-01') as date) OR '#ignore_dates_before#'='') JOIN sample_attribute_values sampHabVal2 on sampHabVal2.sample_id=samp2.id AND sampHabVal2.sample_attribute_id=#habitat_attr_id# AND sampHabVal2.deleted=false JOIN termlists_terms ttHab2 ON ttHab2.id=sampHabVal2.int_value AND ttHab2.parent_id IS NOT NULL AND (ttHab2.id=ttHab.id) AND ttHab2.deleted=false JOIN surveys su2 on su2.id=samp2.survey_id AND su2.deleted=false AND (su2.id=#survey_id# OR #survey_id#=0)
LEFT JOIN
(select plot3.id as plot_id, count(distinct ttl3.taxon_meaning_id) as count FROM locations plot3 JOIN samples samp3 on samp3.location_id = plot3.id AND samp3.deleted=false AND (samp3.created_on >= CAST(COALESCE('#ignore_dates_before#','1500-01-01') as date) OR '#ignore_dates_before#'='') JOIN sample_attribute_values sampHabVal3 on sampHabVal3.sample_id=samp3.id AND sampHabVal3.sample_attribute_id=#habitat_attr_id# AND sampHabVal3.deleted=false JOIN termlists_terms ttHab3 ON ttHab3.id=sampHabVal3.int_value AND ttHab3.parent_id IS NOT NULL AND (ttHab3.id=ttHab.id) AND ttHab3.deleted=false JOIN surveys su3 on su3.id=samp3.survey_id AND su3.deleted=false AND (su3.id=#survey_id# OR #survey_id#=0) LEFT JOIN occurrences o3 on o3.sample_id=samp3.id AND o3.deleted=false LEFT JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl3 on ttl3.id=o3.taxa_taxon_list_id AND ttl3.deleted=false WHERE plot3.deleted=false GROUP BY plot3.id) plot_counts ON plot_counts.plot_id=plot2.id WHERE plot2.deleted=false GROUP BY plot2.id,plot_counts.count) as counts)
